name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Genshin Impact Hu Tao EP Live Wallpaper Haberikra

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Bring Hu Tao's spooky charm to your browser! Download now for enchanting Genshin Impact wallpapers and a playful new tab experience.
short.de,es,fr: Bring Hu Tao's spooky charm to your browser! Download now for enchanting Genshin Impact live wallpapers and a playful new tab…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the whimsical world of Hu Tao, the 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, with this dynamic live wallpaper extension! Each new tab features high-quality, animated visuals of Hu Tao, showcasing her fiery Pyro powers and playful personality, making it a delight for fans of Genshin Impact.

Key Features:
Dynamic Hu Tao Wallpapers: Enjoy animated backgrounds that highlight Hu Tao’s mischievous charm and fiery Pyro abilities.
Clock & Date Display: Stay on schedule with a sleek clock and date interface designed to complement the Genshin aesthetic.
Quick Access Links: Easily navigate your favorite websites with customizable shortcuts.
Additional Options: Discover more extensions, view privacy policies, or uninstall effortlessly.
Whether you're a fan of Hu Tao’s unique humor, her stunning design, or her powerful combat style, this extension transforms your browser into a tribute to one of Genshin Impact’s most beloved characters.

Download now and let Hu Tao’s fiery energy haunt your new tabs with charm and fun!
